about_the_game:
Set in the United States of the 19th century.
It is a game that aims to acquire all railway lines by trading.
Get a railroad permit and open a new city.
Make money by trading, research technology, and upgrade your locomotive.
Technological research can evolve steam locomotives.
Let's challenge the quest!

Major features

  • Set in 19th century America
  • Get a railroad network that connects cities in the United States during the pioneering era
  • Use locomotives to carry supplies and passengers
  • Develop technology and evolve locomotives. The evolved locomotive can carry a lot of supplies at once.
  • Bring your necessities to the city and increase the satisfaction of your residents.
  • Clear the request from the mayor and raise your fame!
  • It costs a lot to get the whole rail network
  • Make money through trade!

name: Train Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: corei5 7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA GEFORCE 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: corei5 7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA GEFORCE 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a railway history simulation game.Set in the United States of the 19th century. Get a railroad network that connects cities in the pioneering America. Use locomotives to carry supplies, passengers, and get money through trade. Complete various quests and gain fame.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
